General.Name: Man Industries (India) Limited
General.Description: Man Industries (India) Limited manufactures, processes, and trades in submerged arc welded pipes and steel products in India. The company offers longitudinal submerged arc welded line pipes for use in oil, gas, petrochemicals, fertilizers, and dredging sectors; and helically submerged arc welded line pipes for use in oil and gas transportation, water supply, sewerage, agriculture, and construction, as well as for high pressure applications. It also provides various options of coating systems, which include internal blasting and painting, coal tar enamel, external and internal, and concrete weight coating, as well as single layer fusion bonded epoxy, 3 layer polyethylene, and 3 layer polypropylene coating systems. The company also exports its products. Man Industries (India) Limited was incorporated in 1988 and is based in Mumbai, India.
